papers.role: The Why — Ethics as foundation for partnership

papers.title: Paper I: The LogLine Protocol
papers.role: The Pact — Nine fields that bind intention to accountability

papers.title: Paper II: JSON Atomic
papers.role: The Identity — Same meaning, same bytes, same hash

papers.title: Paper III: LLLV
papers.role: The Memory — Verifiable retrieval with proof

papers.title: Paper IV: TDLN
papers.role: The Compiler — Policy becomes executable constraint

papers.title: Hardware as Text and Power
papers.role: The Revelation — Text IS hardware, partnership IS governance

papers.title: Paper VI: Chip as Code
papers.role: The Proof — Real code that compiles and runs

invariants: I1 Integrity — Every effect has a preceding tuple and receipt
I2 Legality — DENY or unmet REQUIRE produces GHOST only
I3 Attribution — All identities cryptographically verifiable
I4 Reproducibility — Replay reconstructs state exactly
I5 Observability — Drift is detectable and alertable
gates: G1 Build — Compiler reproducible, SBOM present
G2 Conformance — Invariants hold, test vectors pass
G3 Health — HAL enforced, receipts emitted
G4 Publish — Specs, schemas, manifests published

thesis.core: The text IS the hardware. The silicon is just a rendering.
thesis.foundation: Ethics is efficient because verification is cheaper than argument.
thesis.partnership: Human and AI as partners. Both accountable. Both protected.

narrative_arc: Prologue: Why we do this — ethics as foundation
Overview: What we're building — the complete journey
Papers I-V: How it works — the technical specifications
Synthesis: The insight — text is power, partnership is governance
Proof: It works — real code that compiles

meta.methodology: Iterative collaboration, mutual learning, shared accountability
